medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient woke up at 12:30 am last night with diffuse abdominal pain and distention, which was initially mild but has become constant and stabbing over 12 hours. Symptoms did not improve after using a stool softener and taking 2 Tylenol. Patient has experienced 2 similar episodes in the past, with the last episode occurring several years ago, but this episode is reported as more severe.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes (not insulin dependent), chronic kidney disease (CKD) with 70% kidney function, hypertension (HTN), hyperlipidemia (HLD).
